2007-10-23

Frock and roll


P1020715
(originally uploaded by mountmccabe)

I must admit that It bothered me when I read on Damon & Naomi's website that...


Naomi has been dressed for this tour by designer Gary Graham. You'll have to follow the band to see all the outfits

...because...well...nothing really looks cooler than jeans and a T-shirt so why bother with fancy frocks?

But Naomi looks great in this picture - and as frocks go I'd have to say that this looks very nice...although accesorizing with that bass guitar makes all the difference! But of course Naomi always looks great.

Apologies for the crap title pun!
